title: Palette
desc:
*Maybe not the type of Wheel of Fortune you'd like to spin - Unless you enjoy flinging paint on yourself and all your walls.*

Grants 5 defense, and if you roll your weapon's maximum damage, you will also be granted two turns of a random Positive and Gradual status effect.

This can mean some extra damage or defense, negative status immunity, a bit of healing or even some extra money for killing the enemy right afterwards.

Once this shield's effect activates, it cannot activate again for the next 5 turns.
